metas.description: The Kim Muir Challenge Cup Race Card will feature each runner and their form and price for the race at the Cheltenham Festival.

page.content:
Kim Muir Challenge Cup Race Card

The Kim Muir Challenge Cup is the final race on the card on day 3 of the Cheltenham Festival and it is always an excellent way to round off a great days racing at Prestbury Park. The race card will be on offer on race day and will incoude details for each of the runners in the field, the betting odds and the form lines will also be worth a read before making that all important bet.

Kim Muir Challenge Cup Race Card
